mapper.select: select ort.rn, ort.no, ort.title, ort.content, ort.hit, ort.reg_date regDate, ort.user_no, ort.name from (select rownum rn, ot.no, ot.title, ot.content, ot.hit, ot.reg_date, ot.user_no, ot.name from (select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.user_no, u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc) ot )ort where rn>=#{startRnum} and rn<=#{endRnum}

SELECT BO.no, BO.title, BO.content, US.name, BO.hit, TO_CHAR(BO.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, US.no userNo FROM board BO, users US WHERE BO.user_no = US.no
and BO.title like '%'|| #{aaa} ||'%'
order by reg_date desc
SELECT BO.no, BO.title, BO.content, US.name, BO.hit, TO_CHAR(BO.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, US.no userNo FROM board BO, users US WHERE BO.user_no = US.no order by reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into board values ( seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo} )
